channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A conversation about MLK's legacy, and a second Trump administration
item.description: Monday marks both the observance of Martin Luther King Jr. day and the inauguration of Donald Trump as our 47th President. We reflect on this with sch...

item.title: Cardinal Nolan, Rev. Graham pray at Trump's inauguration
item.description: Cardinal Timothy Dolan and Rev. Franklin Graham prayed for President-elect Donald Trump before he was sworn in as the 47th president during his inaugu...

item.title: Trump to make historic move towards revoking birthright citizenship
item.description: Trump wants to reinterpret the phrasing of the 14th Amendment to mean that the federal government would not recognize automatic birthright citizenship...

item.title: Watch Live: Trump's 2025 inauguration ceremony at the Capitol
item.description: Donald Trump is now the 47th president of the United States. Follow live coverage and watch a live stream of the inauguration here.

item.title: Snoop Dogg and others face heat for performing at Trump s pre-inauguration ball
item.description: The rapper Snoop Dogg has been taking criticism for performing at one of President Trump's pre-inauguration events over the weekend.

item.title: What executive orders is Trump expected to sign on day one?
item.description: The incoming president has said he will "make heads spin" with a blitz of unilateral actions after he is sworn in.

item.title: Trump returns to power after unprecedented comeback, emboldened to reshape American institutions
item.description: Donald Trump has been sworn in as the 47th president. He is promising a “revolution of common sense” and taking charge as Republicans assume unified c...

item.title: Watch: Tea with Biden and carpooling to the Capitol - Trump's day so far
item.description: "Welcome home." The outgoing president welcomed his successor to the White House before they headed to the ceremony.

item.title: Biden issues pre-emptive pardons for siblings, Fauci and Jan 6 riot panel
item.description: The outgoing president says the action will prevent "unjustified... politically motivated prosecutions".

item.title: Costco workers ready to strike on Feb. 1, Teamsters say
item.description: Costco Teamsters voted to authorize nationwide walkout by more than 18,000 workers over wages and benefits.

item.title: Bezos, Zuckerberg, Pichai attend Trump's inauguration
item.description: Top tech billionaires including some who were critics of Trump during his first term flock to his inaugural celebrations.

item.title: All of the Day 1 executive actions Trump has announced so far
item.description: Trump is expected to sign a slew of actions relating to immigration and other issues.

item.title: Fire-ravaged Southern California braces for gusty winds and heightened wildfire risk
Biden pardons Fauci, Milley and the Jan. 6 committee in effort to guard against ‘revenge’ by Trump
Trump to sign orders ending diversity programs
item.description: Trump is set to axe funding dedicated to promoting diversity, equity and inclusion within the federal government.

item.title: Watch: Tea with Biden and carpooling to the Capitol - Trump's day so far
item.description: "Welcome home." The outgoing president welcomed his successor to the White House before they headed to the ceremony.

item.title: Trump, Vance sworn in at inauguration at U.S. Capitol
item.description: President Trump and Vice President JD Vance have been sworn in moments after officially taking office at noon on the dot. Chief Justice John Roberts s...

item.title: Key moments from Trump's inaugural address
item.description: President Donald Trump's second inaugural address gave clues about what Trump will focus on — and how he sees the country.
